title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: Road Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Advisories     Road Conditions                Road Conditions       Please Note: If it snowed or rained yesterday, or is snowing or raining today, do not attempt driving on any of these roads. When water has pooled on the roads or muddy intimidating bogs block passage, turn around, staying on the road. Never drive off the road in an attempt to circumvent the blockage. Not only are you likely to get into more trouble off of the road, even damaging your vehicle, you will cause extensive damage to fragile native plant communities. Regulations do require that all vehicles must stay stay on designated roads.
